task_text: Who is the most busy employee from Human Resources (HR) (by total workload/time slices)

text_blocks: I need to find the most busy employee from Human Resources (HR) department. Let me first get all HR employees and then calculate their workloads from project allocations.

1. Alessandro Romano (BwFV_133)
2. Giorgio Pellegrini (BwFV_134)
3. Arianna Orlando (BwFV_135)

Now I need to find all projects and check which of these HR employees are on project teams. Let me start gathering project data.
